headline.main: AXIS AIMS TO KEEP GREECE ISOLATED; Would Hold Off Yugoslavia and Turkey While Using Bulgaria as a Constant Threat TURKS' STAND STRONGER Bombing of Rome and Other Italian Cities Advocated-- Sofia Watches Neighbor

lead_paragraph: BELGRADE, Yugoslavia, Oct. 31 --A concerted Axis effort by veiled threats and promises to isolate Greece from Yuoslavia and Turkey while attempting to force a quick armistice in the Greek-Italian hostilities, was disclosed by well-informed foreign circles in Belgrade tonight.
